alert.note: Alert for Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 11:19AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Manatee and Sarasota Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1118 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saint Armands Key to 23 miles south of Gulf Gate Estates. Movement was north northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Port, Sarasota, Bradenton, Palmetto, Lakewood Ranch, Ellenton, Sarasota Springs, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Saint Armands Key, North Sarasota, Memphis, Sarasota Bradenton Airport, West Samoset, Southgate, Gulf Gate Estates, Myakka River State Park, The Meadows, Ridge Wood Heights and South Bradenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
